name: 60 Seconds to Die (Capsicle2)
description:
Welcome to the moon! Upon trying to re-enter the moon base the airlock exploded, resulting in you hitting your head and damaging your oxygen levels! You have 60 seconds to navigate yourself to the other airlock before you run out of oxygen.

Use WASD to move and mouse to change direction. 

Hint: Try to get closer to the radio chatter, the closer you are the louder it gets. If you hear yourself bump into something metal then you know you're getting closer to the airlock, good luck!
